articles.title: Ex-Yankees flop Gary Sanchez breaks out of slump in a big way - NJ.com
articles.description: The San Diego Padres claimed catcher Gary Sanchez off waivers last month.
articles.content:
Gary Sanchez has rocked another homer for San Diego.
The Padres catcher ended a 0-for-22 slump with a three-run home run in Thursdays 10-0 win over the Giants.
